item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Hi PS.

I’m Lane and I really want to write for you! (And I don’t use adverbs lightly. Or exclamation marks for that matter.)

I spied your content writer role on SEEK on Saturday and whipped up this presentation to showcase me, my writing, and my bonus skills. I also rewrote some of your website copy because I believe if words can be better they should be… and because I found some typos on your homepage.

Welcome to Presentation Lane… because some jobs are worth more than an email.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi I’m Lane — a halloumi whore and affogato addict who dreams of liberation and llama farming. I’ll love you forever if you’ll just read me aloud DFW’s Infinite Jest… a book I’ve owned forever but never read. If you’re not down for David can we fly to Tokyo, suck down saké, and sing karaoke until sunrise?

Wine and art are the way to my heart when cheese and coffee aren’t appropriate. I’m real and really on Twitter @THINKLN.

Nb: I don’t understand footy, fishing, or photos with tied-up tigers in Thailand.


Above is my Tinder profile: verbatim. I say if you can’t use your Tinder profile as a sample of your writing and an insight to your soul then you’re a weak writer, a liar, or both.


Below are my Twitter photos: @THINKLN is where I share some of my wit, work, and moments that make me “me”.

item.title: I Write
item.description: I believe I’m a brilliant writer. And conceptualist.

item.title: I More Than Write
item.description:
Writing’s my true love but not my only skill. I have a bunch of others that afford me great insight into brand language puzzles and allows me to see how different pieces compliment each other, and why, sometimes, compromises must be made.


I Code

I hand-coded this website using some of the best tools in the business to build and host it…

  • CloudFlare: Power, protection, and encryption
  • Hugo: A static web engine written in Go language
  • Github: Version control and static website hosting
  • Bootstrap: A responsive, mobile-first website framework



I Optimise, Analyse, & Socialise

I’m also competent with the following tools and technologies…

  • WordPress: Advanced WordPress admin, management, hosting, and configuration — including WordPress Multisite
  • Social Media: Twitter, Instagram, Hootsuite
  • Graphics: Photoshop, Illustrator, Affinity, and more.
  • Analytics: Google Analytics, Webmaster Tools, Gaug.es, etc.
  • Optimisation: Optimizely and other A/B testing tools
  • Website Performance: Pagespeed, minification, concatenation, etc.
  • Email Marketing: Mailchimp et. al.

item.title: I Run
item.description:
Away from work I love to run — running is my thing. Before I ran I rode, competitively. I find physical challenge as rewarding as the creative kind and pushing my mind and body ultimately brings out the best in both. I once rode 3,300km (solo!) in 21 days for a personal challenge (raising money for charity along the way). Currently I practice mindfulness, run regularly, drink rarely, drug never, fast intermittently, and Wim Hoff daily.



tl;dw — Wimm Hoff is redefining the science of human physiology through the power of his mind. It’s almost unbelievable (and I don’t use adverbs lightly). Part of Wimm’s daily routine is cold water therapy. It’s also part of mine.

item.title: Rewriting PS
item.description:
I believe if words can be better they should be. So the question is always, can they? And most of the time they can.



PS HOMEPAGE / presentationstudio.com

Current Copy V’s My Rewrites

Specialising in Presentation Design & PowerPoint Design, we create presentations that are influential, memorable and successful.
Specialising in Presentation and PowerPoint Design we deliver messages that are memorable, meaningful, and successful.


In an over-paced, hectic world an opportunity to communicate face to face with your audience is a rare opportunity to in advance your career and grow your company.
In today’s busy world the opportunity to communicate directly with an audience is rare and invaluable.


Whether it’s pitching for new business, motivating your sales team or giving a keynote speech, we’ll ensure your presentation is influential, memorable and successful, in three specific ways.
Whether you’re pitching new business, motivating staff, or keynote speaking, we ensure your presentations are memorable, meaningful, and successful.


Free presentation insight sessions
How many of your colleagues and competitors have been trained in giving an influential presentation? Set yourself apart from the crowd and get that competitive edge in your career. LEARN MORE.
Free Presentation Insights
How many of your competitors have professional presentation training? How many of your colleagues do? Stand out from the crowd and progress your professional life. LEARN MORE.

item.title: BLURBMSITH
item.description:
A Blurbsmith paints a thousand words in only nine.
—BLURBSMITH


BLURBSMITH is a moniker of mine born to burn excess creativity because sometimes I’m drinking Milo in my kitchen and I spill it; sometimes I’m walking back from the store eating my second Cherry Ripe Dark Ganache for the day thinking, “This is the best thing ever. Almost…”; other times I just want to take some words I’ve already written and make them into more.

item.title: CONCISELY
item.description: #WordsWithin is a playful new series I’m sending out to the social medias via CONCISELY, which is my freelance copywriting service.

item.title: PHACES
item.description: PHACES is personal growth project of mine, and while the focus appears to be on those in front of the lens, the real focus is always behind it: www.phac.es.

item.title: The End
item.description:
Thanks for reading Presentation Lane. I’m brand new to Sydney, available immediately, and live just across the park from you. I’m a mature, reliable lover-of-life and while I don’t meet all the criteria for your writer role I excel in areas of it and have a great growth mindset.

I’d love to work with and write for you: more in less is my thing and few do it better.


Always,
Lane

0488 48 24 24 · lane@maily.pro · @THINKLN
